Services and Rates

All forms of tutoring are conducted over Zoom in intervals of one hour. Instruction will be one-on-one in which any specific materials relevant to the session should be sent to jrosenfeld.services@gmail.com prior to the session. Clients will be able to take away a PDF document of the material and notes used during the session for review and use. Practice material may be provided during the sessions and should be requested near the end of the session.

  • Algebra I - $50 per hour
  • Algebra II - $50 per hour
  • Geometry - $50 per hour

  • AP Calculus AB and/or Calculus I - $75 per hour
  • AP Calculus BC and/or Calculus II - $75 per hour
  • Multivariable Calculus - $75 per hour
  • Ordinary Differential Equations - $75 per hour
  • Linear Algebra - $75 per hour

  • High School Level Chemistry - $50 per hour
  • AP Chemistry and/or General Chemistry I/II - $75 per hour
  • High School Level Physics - $50 per hour
  • AP Physics I: Mechanics and/or Physics I - $75 per hour
  • AP Physics II: Mechanics and/or Physics II - $75 per hour
  • Organic Chemistry I/II - $125 per hour

  • SAT Mathematics - $75 per hour
  • ACT Mathematics - $75 per hour
  • PERT Exam Mathematics - $75 per hour

For information on services and rates related to topics in chemical engineering or more advanced topics in higher level mathematics, please contact me through email at jrosenfeld.services@gmail.com .
